instruction: How can I request a refund?
output: You can request a refund by going to 'My Orders', selecting the item, and clicking 'Request Refund'.

instruction: What is your refund policy?
output: Our refund policy allows you to request a refund within 15 days of delivery. Items must be unused and in original condition.

instruction: How long does it take to receive a refund?
output: Refunds are typically processed within 7 business days after approval.

instruction: Where will my refund be credited?
output: Your refund will be credited to the original payment method used during the purchase.

instruction: Can I get a refund if I didn't like the course?
output: Yes. In GUVI we have a 7-day refund policy for eligible courses if you're not satisfied

instruction: I haven't received my refund yet. What should I do?
output: Please allow up to 7 business days for the refund to reflect. If it still hasn't appeared, contact our support team.

instruction: How do I check the status of my refund?
output: You can check your refund status by logging into your account and visiting the 'Refunds & Returns' section or contact our support team.

instruction: Can I cancel a refund request?
output: Yes, You can cancel a refund request on GUVI if it's within the 7-day refund window.

instruction: Is the refund instant?
output: Refunds are not instant. GUVI generally processes refunds within 7 business days

instruction: I accidentally requested a refund. What should I do?
output: Please contact our customer support team immediately so we can review and possibly cancel your request.

instruction: Will I be notified when my refund is approved?
output: Yes, you will be notified if your refund from GUVI is processed

instruction: How do I get certified for a course?
output: To get certified in a course you need to successfully complete all quizzes and submissions with 100% progression.

instruction: My progression is 100%, but the certificate isn't loading/generating. What should I do?
output: Please clear your browser history and try again. If the issue persists, log out and log back in, then try again.

instruction: I don't know the answer to the quiz of a course, can I still get certified?
output: Please ensure you complete the quiz with the correct answer. You can attempt the quiz an unlimited number of times.

instruction: How can I change my name on my certificate/profile??
output: Please follow these steps: Go to your profile -> Edit your name -> Refresh your browser (CTRL + F5) -> Regenerate your certificate.

instruction: Where can I find the certificate? Where is the 'Get Certified' option?
output: You need to click on the 'Get Certified' option at the end of the course modules in the table of contents. It will only be displayed after you complete all the lessons with 100% progress.

instruction: I cannot download my certificate, a blank screen appears, what should I do?
output: The certificate should automatically download. Please check your downloads folder, the certificate will download as a PDF file. For better results, try using Google Chrome.

instruction: Why is Course X not available in Y language?
output: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We are committed to offering courses in as many regional languages as possible. Please send your request to info@guvi.in.

instruction: What can I do with GEEKOINS?
output: GUVI users can use GEEKOINS to purchase courses and 'run counts,' useful in CodeKata, WebKata, and Debugging, and redeem coupons from the rewards section.

instruction: What is your refund policy? I want a refund for my course
output: Refunds are processed within 7 working days from the date you fill out the refund form, which will be sent to your email by our team. To request a refund, please contact us at info@guvi.in or reach out to your course coordinator via email or phone, providing your details and the reason for the refund.

instruction: Where can I find the courses?
output: Please visit this link https://www.guvi.in/courses to view our course library.

instruction: I'm not able to log in. Please help.
output: Please refresh your browser (CTRL + SHIFT + R for Windows, CMD + SHIFT + R for Mac) and try again. Also, consider trying a different browser.

instruction: Are there any conditions for refunds?
output: To be eligible for a refund, you must request it within 7 days of purchase, typically by sending an email to the support team with a clear reason for the refund

instruction: Do I get a full refund?
output: You will receive a full refund if requested within 7 days of the purchase date.

instruction: Can I get a refund if I paid with store credit?
output: If you paid with store credit, your refund will be credited back to your store wallet.

instruction: Is there a restocking fee on refunds?
output: No, At GUVI we do not charge a restocking fee for refunds on eligible courses. If you're unhappy with a course, you can request a refund within 7 days of purchase.

instruction: My bank says the refund is not received. What now?
output: Please wait 7 business days, then contact your bank. If unresolved, contact us with your refund reference.

instruction: Can I get a refund to a different account?
output: Refunds are only issued to the original payment method for security reasons.

instruction: My refund shows completed but I don't see the money.
output: Sometimes banks take additional time to reflect the refund. Contact your bank or our support for help.

instruction: I got partial refund. Why not full?
output: We are sorry that you face this issue. Please contact our support team so we can review and possibly adjust your refund.

instruction: What documents do I need for a refund?
output: Your name, course details, the reason for the refund, and any relevant payment information. If required, support will let you know if anything else is needed.

instruction: What if the refund goes to the wrong account?
output: We only refund to the original source. Contact support immediately if there's any issue with your account.

instruction: Is there a faster way to get a refund?
output: We process all refunds in the order they are received. Expedited refund is not available at this time.

instruction: I was promised a refund but haven't received it.
output: We're sorry for the delay. Please contact support with your order ID and refund reference.

instruction: What if I missed the refund deadline?
output: Unfortunately, we cannot process refunds after the deadline. Please refer to our refund policy.

instruction: Can I get a refund in cash?
output: We do not provide cash refunds. All refunds are processed digitally to your original payment method.

instruction: Can I dispute a refund decision?
output: Yes. If you feel a refund was wrongly denied, please contact support and submit additional details.

instruction: Are taxes refunded too?
output: Yes, any applicable taxes paid are refunded along with the item cost.

instruction: I used a discount code. Will I get the full refund?
output: Your refund will be based on the discounted amount you paid, not the original price.

instruction: Can I split the refund across two methods?
output: No. Refunds are always issued to the single original payment method used.

instruction: What if I don't want a refund, just credit?
output: You can choose store credit as your refund method when submitting the request.

instruction: Where is my paid course?
output: To find your paid courses on GUVI, log in to your account and navigate to the 'My Courses' section

instruction: My course is not available yet. What should I do?
output: We're sorry for the delay. Please check the information in your account. If it's stuck, contact our support team with your order ID.

instruction: It says my order has been placed, but I can't access my course.
output: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please contact support for assistance.

instruction: My tracking number is not working.
output: Sometimes tracking updates are delayed. Please try again after a few hours. If the issue persists, contact support with your order ID.

instruction: A user is asking about the refund policy. Explain the general refund window.
input: What is your refund policy? Can I get my money back if I don't like a course?
output: Yes, we want you to be satisfied with your learning experience. All eligible courses purchased on GUVI can be refunded within 7 days of purchase. If you are unhappy with a course for any reason, you can request a refund as long as the request meets the guidelines and is made within the 7-day window.

instruction: A user wants to know why their refund request might be denied. List the common reasons.
input: Are there any situations where you wouldn't give a refund?
output: Yes, there are a few situations where a refund request might be denied. According to our policy, these include cases where: a significant portion of the course was watched or downloaded before the request, multiple refunds have been requested for the same course, a user has requested an excessive number of refunds, or the user's account was banned for violating our terms of service.

instruction: A user is asking about the minimum age to use GUVI. State the age requirement.
input: Can my 12-year-old son sign up for a course?
output: According to our Terms of Service, the GUVI service is not available to persons under the age of thirteen (13). All users must be at least 13 years of age to create an account and use our services.

instruction: A user is asking if they can share their account credentials with a friend.
input: Is it okay if I share my login and password with my friend so he can also watch the course?
output: No, sharing your account is not permitted. As per our Terms of Service, your account credentials (User ID and password) are for your use only and must not be shared with others. Every user needs to have their own individual account.

instruction: A Zen Class student wants to change their batch. Explain the policy on batch transfers.
input: I'm in the Zen Class but my schedule changed. Can I move to a different batch?
output: Yes, batch transfers are possible. A maximum of two batch transfers are allowed during the main bootcamp, and they must be used within the course completion period. Please note that after the second transfer, a fee of 2,000 INR will be charged for any subsequent batch shift. Batch allocation is based on availability at the time of your request.

instruction: A Zen Class student is asking about taking a break from their course. Explain the policy.
input: I have a personal emergency and need to take a break from my Zen Class. Is that allowed?
output: Yes, you can take a break. Our policy allows for one break per course per learner, and the break duration should not exceed 20 days. Please be aware that if the course fee increases while you are on break, you will be required to pay the difference upon rejoining.

instruction: A user is asking about the placement guarantee for Zen Class.
input: Do you guarantee a job after I complete the Zen Class?
output: Our Zen Class program is a career guidance program that comes with 100% placement support, not a placement guarantee. We provide extensive support including resume building, mock interviews, and connecting you with hiring partners. However, your placement success also depends on your performance, including achieving at least 75% in assessments and mock interviews, and your overall effort during the course.

instruction: A user is worried about their personal data. Explain what GUVI does with their information.
input: What do you do with my personal info like my email and phone number?
output: We collect information like your name, email, and phone number when you register or fill out a form on our site. According to our Privacy Policy, by providing these details, you agree that we may call, SMS, email, or WhatsApp you regarding our products and offers, even if your number is on a Do Not Disturb (DND) list. We keep a record of this information to respond to you and provide our services.

instruction: A user wants to cancel their Zen Class enrollment after starting.
input: I have started the Zen bootcamp but want to cancel my admission. Is that possible?
output: Once your enrollment in the main Zen Class bootcamp is confirmed, foreclosure, EMI/course cancellation, or holding of EMI payments are not permitted. If you have any specific concerns, you should reach out to your course coordinator directly.

instruction: A user is asking if they will get a refund if they find a job on their own during the Zen Class.
input: What if I get a job by myself while I'm in the Zen Class? Will I get a refund?
output: No. As per our Zen Class terms, if you secure placement from any source outside of GUVI's placement support while enrolled in the program, a refund will not be provided.

instruction: Explain the refund policy for bundles bought from a third party.
input: I bought a GUVI course bundle from another website. How do I get a refund?
output: If you purchased a GUVI course bundle through a third-party vendor, you will need to contact that vendor directly to request a refund. Since the payment was processed by them, we do not have the transaction on file and cannot initiate the refund from our end.

instruction: Clarify the refund policy for subscription services.
input: Is the 7-day refund policy applicable to subscriptions as well?
output: The 7-day refund policy applies to individual course purchases. For subscription services, we do not grant refunds after the initial 7-day period has passed. This restriction will be enforced as permitted by applicable law.

instruction: A user is asking what happens if they provide inaccurate information during registration.
input: What if I used a fake name when I signed up?
output: According to our Terms of Service, you agree that the information you provide upon registration and at all other times will be true, accurate, current, and complete. Maintaining accurate account information is your responsibility.

instruction: Explain the user's responsibility for the content they post.
input: Am I responsible for the code I upload to the platform?
output: Yes, you are responsible for any content that you create, transmit, or display while using GUVI's services. You are also responsible for any consequences that may arise from your content.

instruction: A Zen class student is asking about the consequences of missing a live session.
input: What happens if I miss a live class in the Zen program?
output: If you miss a live session in the Zen Class, you are expected to utilize the recorded sessions which are made available to you. There will not be any additional live sessions provided to cover the missed class.

instruction: Explain the policy on uninformed leave for Zen Class students.
input: Can I just take a day off from my Zen class if I'm not feeling well?
output: You should not take uninformed leave. If you need to take a leave of absence, you must raise the request through the Zen portal. This ensures your coordinators are aware and your absence is documented.

instruction: Detail the consequences of misconduct or harassment in the Zen Class.
input: What is GUVI's policy on harassment?
output: Harassment or misconduct, including inappropriate comments, gestures, or advances towards fellow learners or GUVI employees, is strictly prohibited. Any reported incident will be immediately investigated, and offenders may face disciplinary action, including warnings, suspension, or removal from the course.

instruction: Clarify the assessment criteria for receiving placement assistance in Zen Class.
input: Do I have to pass all the tests to get job support in the Zen class?
output: Yes, your performance in assessments is crucial. To be eligible for job assistance, you must score at least 75% in the weekly topic-wise assessments and the mock interviews conducted by GUVI. Failure to meet this requirement may result in the management not being obligated to provide you with job assistance.

instruction: Guide a user whose certificate is not generating despite 100% progress.
input: My course progress is 100%, but I can't see my certificate. What should I do?
output: If your certificate isn't generating, please try clearing your browser's cache and history and then try again. If the issue continues, please log out of your account and log back in. This usually resolves the problem.

instruction: Explain how a user can change their name on their certificate.
input: My name is spelled wrong on my certificate. How can I fix it?
output: You can easily correct your name. Please follow these steps: Go to your profile, edit your name to the correct spelling, perform a hard refresh of your browser (usually CTRL+F5 or CMD+SHIFT+R), and then regenerate your certificate from the course page.

instruction: Explain what GEEKOINS are and how they can be used.
input: What are these 'Geekoins' I see on the platform?
output: GEEKOINS are reward points you can earn on the GUVI platform. You can earn them through activities like CodeKata, WebKata, and referrals. These points can be used to purchase courses, get more 'run counts' for practice platforms, or redeem coupons and other rewards.

instruction: A user wants to know if GUVI sells their data to third parties.
input: Do you sell my personal information to other companies?
output: Our Privacy Policy outlines how we handle your data. While we may share information with third parties to provide our services, we are committed to protecting your personal information. The policy details the types of third parties involved and your rights regarding your data.

instruction: Explain what an 'Eligible Purchase' is in the affiliate program.
input: How do I make a sale as a GUVI affiliate?
output: In our affiliate program, an 'Eligible Purchase' occurs when a customer clicks through your unique referral link to the GUVI website, adds a qualifying product to their cart, and completes the purchase during a single session. A session is typically valid for 30 days after the click.

instruction: A user asks if they can download course videos and share them.
input: Can I download the course videos and upload them to my YouTube channel?
output: No, you do not have the right to reproduce, distribute, or publicly display any content that does not belong to you. The GUVI services are for your own personal learning purposes. Unauthorized distribution of our content is a violation of our Terms of Service.

instruction: Explain the policy on transferring Zen Class enrollment to another person.
input: I can't continue my Zen class. Can I transfer my enrollment to my brother?
output: Yes, enrollment transfer is possible. The original learner must send an official email requesting the transfer with the new recipient's details. The new recipient must also agree via email. However, GUVI will not be involved in any financial transaction; you must manage the transfer of fees between yourselves independently.

instruction: A user is asking about their responsibility for an educational loan for a course.
input: Who is responsible for the loan I took for the Zen class?
output: As per the terms you agree to, you take sole responsibility for the educational loan you have taken to pursue a course with us. GUVI is not a party to your loan agreement.

instruction: A user is asking what happens if they defame GUVI on social media.
input: What if I post something negative about GUVI online?
output: Our terms state that learners should not involve themselves or others in any actions that could defame GUVI. Misusing or defaming the GUVI Zen Class name on any social media platform can lead to removal from the program.

instruction: Explain the payment timeline for affiliate income.
input: When do I get paid for my affiliate sales?
output: We compute your advertising income after the 7-day refund period for the customer has passed. The payout for each eligible purchase is made by the end of the calendar month after the refund period is cleared.

instruction: A user is asking if affiliate income includes taxes.
input: Is the affiliate payout inclusive of GST?
output: It depends on the product. For GUVI's Tech Courses and HackerKID products, the advertising income payable to you is inclusive of all taxes. For Zen Class Career Programs, the income is exclusive of taxes like GST.

instruction: Clarify if GUVI guarantees the accuracy of content posted by other users.
input: I saw a comment from another user with a solution. Is it guaranteed to be correct?
output: GUVI does not and cannot control all content posted by users and does not guarantee the accuracy, integrity, or quality of such content. You should evaluate and bear all risks associated with using any user-generated content.

instruction: A user is asking about their rights to the content they create on the platform.
input: Do I still own the projects I build on your platform?
output: Yes, you own the content you create. However, by posting it, you grant GUVI the necessary licenses and permissions to use that content to enable its inclusion and use within the GUVI service as described in our Terms of Service.

instruction: A user is having trouble logging in. Provide basic troubleshooting steps.
input: I can't log in to my account. Please help.
output: I'm sorry you're having trouble. Please try doing a hard refresh of your browser (CTRL+SHIFT+R for Windows/Linux, or CMD+SHIFT+R for Mac). If that doesn't work, please try logging in with a different web browser, such as Google Chrome.

instruction: A user can't find the 'Get Certified' option for their course.
input: I finished my course but I don't see the 'Get Certified' button.
output: The 'Get Certified' option will only appear in the course's table of contents after you have completed all lessons and your progress is at 100%. Please double-check that all modules and quizzes are marked as complete.

instruction: A user asks if they can get a certificate if they fail a quiz.
input: I failed the quiz. Can I still get my certificate?
output: To get certified, you need to successfully complete all quizzes. However, you can attempt the quizzes an unlimited number of times, so you can always go back, review the material, and try the quiz again until you pass.

instruction: Explain the consequences of failing to make EMI payments for Zen Class.
input: What happens if I miss my EMI payment for the Zen class?
output: Failure to complete your full payment or EMI by the due date is a violation of our policy. This can lead to your removal from the Zen Class program.

instruction: A user wants to know how to request a refund.
input: How do I actually request a refund?
output: To request a refund, please contact us at info@guvi.in or reach out to your course coordinator via email or phone. You will need to provide your details and the reason for the refund, and our team will send you a refund form to fill out.

instruction: Clarify the refund processing time.
input: How long does it take to get the money back after a refund is approved?
output: Once you have filled out the refund form, refunds are typically processed within 7 working days from that date. The amount will be transferred back to the original payment method you used.

instruction: A user is asking about the purpose of cookies on the GUVI website.
input: Are you tracking me with cookies?
output: No, GUVI does not store cookies to track user behavior anonymously. We only use cookies to provide a single sign-on (SSO) experience in our QA platforms for a better user experience. These cookies are only generated for registered users.

instruction: A user asks what happens to their account if it's suspended.
input: My account was suspended. Can I still access my courses?
output: If your account is suspended or removed from the GUVI service by us due to a violation of our terms, you will lose access to the service and its content. Users whose accounts are banned are also not eligible to receive a refund.

instruction: A Zen class student asks if the job offers will have a specific salary.
input: Will the job offers I get through placement support have a high salary?
output: As per our policy, you understand and agree that the hiring company's offers and salary packages will be based on the current market demand and your individual performance in interviews. We do not guarantee specific salary amounts.

instruction: I forgot my password. How can I reset it?
output: You can reset your password by clicking on "Forgot Password?" on the login page and following the instructions sent to your registered email.

instruction: I didn't receive the password reset email.
output: Please check your spam/junk folder. If it's not there, wait a few minutes or request a new one. Still no luck? Contact our support.

instruction: Can I reset my password using my phone number?
output: Currently, GUVI allows password resets through your registered email only.

instruction: The reset link isn't working.
output: Password reset links expire after a while. Please request a new one from the "Forgot Password?" page.

instruction: How long is the reset link valid?
output: Password reset links are valid for 30 minutes. After that, you'll need to generate a new one.

instruction: I clicked on the reset link and got an error.
output: Sorry about that! Try clearing your browser cache or using incognito mode. If the issue persists, request a new link.

instruction: I don't remember which email I used to sign up.
output: Please share your full name and mobile number with our support team so we can help identify your account.

instruction: Can I set the same password again?
output: Yes, as long as it meets our security criteria. But we recommend using a new password for your account's safety.

instruction: It says my email is not registered.
output: Please double-check for typos. If you're sure it's correct, try signing up or contact support if you had an old account.

instruction: Can you reset my password for me?
output: For your security, we can't reset it manually. Please use the "Forgot Password?" option on the login page.

instruction: I want to change my password, not reset it.
output: You can change your password by logging in, going to 'Profile > Settings' and selecting 'Change Password.'

instruction: My reset email expired. What now?
output: No worries! Just go to the login page and click "Forgot Password?" to generate a new email.

instruction: What should I do if I don't have access to my email anymore?
output: Please contact our support team with your registered phone number and other details for verification.

instruction: I'm getting an error while entering my new password.
output: Make sure your password meets all requirements (minimum 8 characters, includes a number and a special character).

instruction: I reset my password but still can't log in.
output: Double-check that you're using the new password. If you're still facing issues, try resetting again or contact support.

instruction: My password was changed without my knowledge.
output: Please contact support immediately. We'll help secure your account and guide you through the recovery process.

instruction: Can I reset my password through the mobile app?
output: Yes! The 'Forgot Password?' option works the same on both web and mobile versions.

instruction: Is there a limit to how many times I can reset my password?
output: For security reasons, we limit multiple reset requests in a short time. Please try again after 15 minutes if blocked.

instruction: Will resetting my password log me out from all devices?
output: Yes, once reset, your account will be logged out from all other devices automatically.

instruction: Is it safe to reset passwords through GUVI?
output: Absolutely! We use encrypted links and secure channels for all password reset operations.

instruction: Can I reset my password without logging out?
output: If you remember your old password, you can change it from your profile settings without logging out.

instruction: I didn't request a password reset, but got an email.
output: Please ignore the email if you didn't request it. Your account is still secure unless the link is clicked.

instruction: The reset page is taking too long to load.
output: This could be due to network issues. Try refreshing the page or using a different browser/device.

instruction: I get a 'token expired' error when clicking the reset link.
output: That means the link has expired. Please request a new reset email from the login page.

instruction: How can I make my password strong?
output: Use at least 8 characters including uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and a symbol like ! or # for a strong password.

instruction: Will resetting my password delete my course progress?
output: Not at all. Your course data and certificates remain intact even after a password reset.

instruction: I use Gmail, will the reset email come instantly?
output: Yes, usually within seconds. If you don't see it, check your spam folder or wait a few minutes.

instruction: I'm using a different device, can I still reset my password?
output: Yes, you can reset your password from any device as long as you can access your email.

instruction: I'm locked out of my account.
output: Use the "Forgot Password?" link to reset it. If that doesn't help, contact our support team.

instruction: Can I use my old password again?
output: If it meets the password criteria, yes. But for security reasons, we suggest using a new password.

instruction: Can I use a password manager?
output: Absolutely! Password managers are a great way to store and create secure passwords for GUVI and other platforms.

instruction: How often should I change my password?
output: We recommend changing your password every 3-6 months for security.

instruction: Why do I need to reset my password after inactivity?
output: As a safety measure, we prompt users to reset their password after long inactivity or suspicious login attempts.

instruction: I signed up using Google, how do I reset my password?
output: If you signed up with Google, you don't need a GUVI password. Just log in using the "Continue with Google" option.

instruction: I signed up with email but want to switch to Google login.
output: You can link your Google account in profile settings after logging in, but the login method stays email-based.

instruction: Can I reset password using my username?
output: You'll need to enter the email associated with your username to reset the password.

instruction: What happens if I enter the wrong OTP?
output: You'll get a chance to re-enter a correct OTP. After multiple failed attempts, the link will expire and you'll need a new one.

instruction: Will you send OTP via SMS?
output: Currently, OTPs for password reset are sent only via registered email.

instruction: I clicked "Forgot Password?" but nothing happened.
output: Make sure your internet connection is stable and try refreshing the page. If the problem persists, contact support.

instruction: I accidentally created multiple GUVI accounts.
output: Contact support with both emails. We'll help merge your accounts or delete the unused one.

instruction: Can I set a 4-digit password?
output: No, for security, passwords must be at least 8 characters long with a mix of letters, numbers, and symbols.

instruction: I got locked out after trying the wrong password too many times.
output: Wait 15 minutes and try again or use the "Forgot Password?" option to reset your credentials.

instruction: Will I get a confirmation after resetting?
output: Yes, you'll receive an email confirming your password has been changed successfully.

instruction: Can I contact support through WhatsApp?
output: Currently, we offer support through our helpdesk and email. WhatsApp support is not available.

instruction: My school/college email is disabled. How do I reset my password?
output: Contact our support team and verify your identity. We'll help update your email and reset access.

instruction: I want to update my email too.
output: After logging in, go to Profile > Settings > Account Info. There, you can update your email before resetting the password again.

instruction: The reset process is confusing.
output: We're here to help! Just use the 'Forgot Password?' link and follow the instructions. Contact support if stuck.

instruction: Can someone else reset my password?
output: No one can reset your password without access to your registered email, keeping your account safe.

instruction: Does GUVI store my passwords?
output: No, we never store plain text passwords. Everything is encrypted and secure.

instruction: Is it possible to recover a deleted account?
output: If recently deleted, contact support immediately. After a certain period, account data is permanently removed.

instruction: What courses do you recommend for a beginner in programming?
output: For beginners, I recommend starting with our 'Python for Beginners' or 'Introduction to Web Development' courses. They cover fundamental concepts and are great starting points.

instruction: I want to learn AI. Where should I start?
output: To learn AI, consider our 'Foundations of AI/ML' course, followed by 'Deep Learning with Python' or 'Natural Language Processing'. What's your current programming background?

instruction: Do you have courses on data science?
output: Yes, we have a comprehensive range of Data Science courses, including 'Data Science with Python', 'R for Data Science', and 'Big Data Analytics'. You can explore them in the 'Data Science' category.

instruction: I'm interested in cybersecurity. Any recommendations?
output: For cybersecurity, check out our 'Cybersecurity Fundamentals' and 'Ethical Hacking' courses. They provide practical skills and knowledge in the field.

instruction: What are the prerequisites for the 'Full Stack Development' course?
output: The 'Full Stack Development' course requires basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and a foundational understanding of programming logic. Some experience with a backend language like Python or Node.js is a plus.

instruction: How can I find courses related to cloud computing?
output: You can find cloud computing courses by searching 'cloud computing' in the search bar or by navigating to the 'Cloud & DevOps' category on our platform.

instruction: Are there any free courses available?
output: Yes, GUVI offers several free courses and introductory modules. Look for the 'Free Courses' section on our homepage or filter by 'Free' in the course catalog.

instruction: Can I get a certificate after completing a course?
output: Absolutely! Upon successful completion of most paid courses, you will receive a verifiable course completion certificate from GUVI.

instruction: How long does it take to complete the 'Python for Data Science' course?
output: The 'Python for Data Science' course typically takes about 40-60 hours to complete, depending on your pace and prior experience.

instruction: Do you offer placement assistance after courses?
output: Yes, for certain premium programs and bootcamps, we offer dedicated placement assistance to help you land a job. Check the course details for specific information.

instruction: What's the difference between a 'course' and a 'bootcamp'?
output: Courses are typically self-paced and focus on specific skills, while bootcamps are intensive, structured programs with live sessions, projects, and often placement support.

instruction: Can I get a demo or preview of a course before enrolling?
output: Many of our courses offer free preview lessons or a demo video. Look for the 'Preview' button on the course page to get a glimpse of the content.

instruction: Are the courses updated regularly?
output: Yes, our course content is regularly reviewed and updated to keep pace with the latest industry trends and technologies.

instruction: Do you have courses in regional languages?
output: GUVI is proud to offer courses in several regional languages, including Tamil, Hindi, and Telugu. You can filter courses by language.

instruction: How do I enroll in a course?
output: To enroll, simply navigate to the course page you're interested in, click the 'Enroll Now' or 'Buy Now' button, and follow the payment instructions.

instruction: What payment methods do you accept?
output: We accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards, net banking, UPI, and popular digital wallets.

instruction: Can I pay for a course in installments?
output: For some higher-priced courses and bootcamps, installment payment options are available. Please check the specific course's payment section.

instruction: What is your refund policy?
output: Our refund policy varies by course type and duration. Generally, you can request a refund within a specified period (e.g., 7 days) if you haven't accessed too much content. Please refer to our Terms & Conditions for full details.

instruction: How do I get an invoice for my purchase?
output: After a successful purchase, your invoice will be sent to your registered email address. You can also download it from your 'My Purchases' section on the dashboard.

instruction: When will I get access to the course after payment?
output: You will get instant access to the course content immediately after your payment is successfully processed and confirmed.

instruction: Are there any discounts or offers available?
output: We frequently have discounts and promotional offers. Keep an eye on our homepage banners or subscribe to our newsletter for updates.

instruction: Can I gift a course to someone else?
output: Yes, you can gift a course! Look for the 'Gift this Course' option on the course page, or contact support for assistance.

instruction: My payment failed. What should I do?
output: Please check your internet connection and payment details. You can try again or use an alternative payment method. If issues persist, contact your bank or our support.

instruction: I purchased a course but it's not showing in my dashboard.
output: Please allow a few minutes for the system to update. If it's still not visible after 15 minutes, provide your transaction ID to our support team.

instruction: What is a 'Zen Class'?
output: Zen Class is GUVI's premium live online bootcamp program, offering immersive learning, mentorship, and placement assistance in various tech domains.

instruction: How do I apply for a scholarship?
output: Information on available scholarships and the application process can be found on our 'Scholarships' page, usually linked from the footer or a dedicated section.

instruction: Can I transfer my enrollment to a different course?
output: Course transfers are handled on a case-by-case basis. Please contact our support team with your request and reasons.

instruction: Is there a subscription model for all courses?
output: Currently, we offer individual course purchases and specific bootcamp enrollments. We do not have a universal subscription model for all content.

instruction: How can I update my profile picture?
output: You can update your profile picture by logging in and navigating to 'Profile > Edit Profile'. Look for the option to upload a new image.

instruction: I want to change my registered phone number.
output: To change your registered phone number, go to 'Profile > Settings > Account Info' and edit the contact details. You might need to verify the new number.

instruction: How do I change my name on my certificate?
output: Your certificate name is linked to your profile name. Please ensure your name is correctly updated in 'Profile > Edit Profile' before completing the course. If you need a correction after completion, contact support.

instruction: Can I delete my GUVI account?
output: Yes, you can request account deletion by contacting our support team. Please note that this action is irreversible and will remove all your data.

instruction: How do I manage email notifications from GUVI?
output: You can manage your email notification preferences in 'Profile > Settings > Notification Preferences'. You can choose which types of emails you wish to receive.

instruction: I'm having trouble logging in even with the correct password.
output: Try clearing your browser cache and cookies, or use a different browser/incognito mode. If the issue persists, contact support.

instruction: My account shows incorrect course progress.
output: Please refresh the page or log out and log back in. If the issue persists, provide specific course details to our support team for investigation.

instruction: How can I secure my GUVI account?
output: Always use a strong, unique password, enable two-factor authentication if available, and be cautious of phishing attempts. Never share your login credentials.

instruction: Can I link my social media accounts to my GUVI profile?
output: You can link your Google account for easier login. Check your profile settings for available social login options.

instruction: I want to change my primary email address.
output: To change your primary email, go to 'Profile > Settings > Account Info'. You will need to verify the new email address.

instruction: How do I view my enrolled courses?
output: All your enrolled courses can be found on your personal dashboard under the 'My Courses' or 'My Learning' section after logging in.

instruction: I can't access my course materials.
output: Ensure you are logged in with the correct account that purchased the course. If you still face issues, please contact support with your course name and purchase details.

instruction: Where can I see my certificate?
output: Once you complete a course and meet the criteria, your certificate will be available for download from your 'My Certificates' section on your dashboard.

instruction: I need technical support for a video not playing.
output: Please try refreshing the page, checking your internet connection, or using a different browser. If the video still doesn't play, let us know your browser, device, and the specific video lesson.

instruction: How do I contact GUVI support?
output: You can contact our support team via the 'Help & Support' section on our website, or by sending an email to support@guvi.in.

instruction: I found a bug on the website. How do I report it?
output: Thank you for reporting! Please describe the bug in detail, including steps to reproduce it and screenshots if possible, and send it to our support team.

instruction: How can I provide feedback about a course?
output: We appreciate your feedback! You can usually find a feedback form or rating option within the course interface, or you can email your suggestions to our support team.

instruction: My certificate has a typo in my name.
output: Please ensure your name is correct in your profile settings. If it is and the certificate still has a typo, contact support with your correct name and certificate details.

instruction: I need help with an assignment in a course.
output: For assignment-related queries, please use the dedicated Q&A forum or discussion section within the course. Instructors and mentors will assist you there.

instruction: Can I download course videos for offline viewing?
output: Currently, direct downloading of course videos for offline viewing is not supported due to content security reasons. You need an active internet connection to stream the videos.

instruction: The website is very slow.
output: Please check your internet speed. Try clearing your browser's cache and cookies. If the issue persists, try a different browser or device. Let us know if it continues.

instruction: How do I navigate the GUVI platform?
output: You can use the navigation bar at the top to access courses, bootcamps, Zen Class, and your dashboard. The search bar is also useful for finding specific content.

instruction: Where can I find my course progress?
output: Your progress for each enrolled course is displayed on your dashboard under the 'My Courses' section.

instruction: I want to suggest a new course topic.
output: We'd love to hear your ideas! Please send your course suggestions to our support or feedback email address.

instruction: Are there live classes or only recorded videos?
output: We offer both! Many courses are self-paced with recorded videos, while our Zen Class bootcamps include live interactive sessions with instructors.

instruction: What is the duration of the 'Data Science Bootcamp'?
output: The 'Data Science Bootcamp' typically runs for 6 months, including live sessions, projects, and mentorship.

instruction: Do you offer any career counseling?
output: Yes, for participants in our Zen Class bootcamps, we provide dedicated career counseling and interview preparation support.

instruction: Can I switch between courses if I don't like one?
output: Course transfers are subject to our refund and transfer policy. Please contact support within the eligible period to discuss options.

instruction: What is the 'GUVI Learn' app?
output: The GUVI Learn app is our mobile application available on Android and iOS, allowing you to access courses and learn on the go.

instruction: How do I report inappropriate content?
output: If you encounter any inappropriate content, please report it immediately to support@guvi.in with details and screenshots.

instruction: Is there a community forum for students?
output: Yes, many courses have dedicated discussion forums or community groups where you can interact with fellow students and instructors.

instruction: Can I get a discount if I buy multiple courses?
output: We occasionally offer bundle discounts for purchasing multiple courses. Keep an eye on our promotions page or contact sales for bulk inquiries.

instruction: What are the system requirements for using GUVI?
output: You need a stable internet connection, a modern web browser (Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Safari), and a desktop or laptop computer. Mobile access is available via our app.

instruction: How do I verify my certificate?
output: All GUVI certificates come with a unique verification link or QR code. You can use this on our website to verify the authenticity of the certificate.

instruction: Do you offer corporate training programs?
output: Yes, we offer customized corporate training solutions for businesses. Please visit our 'Corporate Training' section or contact our sales team for details.

instruction: I'm having trouble with the coding environment.
output: Ensure your browser is updated and pop-ups are enabled. If the in-browser IDE isn't working, describe the error message to our support team.

instruction: Can I access course content after the completion date?
output: For self-paced courses, you typically get lifetime access to the content. For bootcamps, access might be limited to a specific period after completion.

instruction: How do I download course resources?
output: Any downloadable resources like code files, PDFs, or datasets will be provided within the course lessons, usually as clickable links or attachments.

instruction: What is GUVI's mission?
output: GUVI's mission is to make technical education accessible and affordable to everyone, especially in their native languages, and to bridge the skill gap in the industry.

instruction: How can I become an instructor on GUVI?
output: If you're interested in becoming an instructor, please visit our 'Teach with GUVI' section or send your resume and course proposal to partners@guvi.in.

instruction: Do you have a mobile app?
output: Yes, we have a mobile app called 'GUVI Learn' available for both Android and iOS devices. You can download it from your respective app store.

instruction: I want to cancel my enrollment.
output: To cancel enrollment, please refer to our refund policy and contact our support team within the eligible refund period.

instruction: Can I get a printed certificate?
output: Currently, we provide digital certificates only, which are verifiable online. We do not offer printed certificates.

instruction: What is the 'Zen Class' refund policy?
output: Zen Class refund policies are typically stricter due to the live nature and limited seats. Please refer to the specific Zen Class program's terms and conditions for details.

instruction: How do I report a technical issue with the platform?
output: Please provide a detailed description of the issue, including screenshots or error messages, and send it to support@guvi.in. Mention your browser and device.

instruction: Can I learn at my own pace?
output: Yes, most of our courses are self-paced, allowing you to learn at a schedule that suits you best. Our bootcamps have a structured schedule but also offer flexibility.

instruction: Are there any live doubt-clearing sessions?
output: For premium courses and Zen Class bootcamps, we often provide live doubt-clearing sessions or dedicated mentor support.

instruction: How do I access the course forum?
output: If a course has a forum, you'll find a link to it within the course dashboard or a specific lesson module.

instruction: What kind of projects are included in the courses?
output: Our courses include a variety of hands-on projects, ranging from small coding exercises to capstone projects that simulate real-world scenarios.

instruction: Can I get a job after completing a GUVI course?
output: While course completion enhances your skills, job placement depends on various factors. Our bootcamps offer dedicated placement assistance to improve your chances.

instruction: How can I track my application status for a bootcamp?
output: You can usually track your bootcamp application status by logging into your GUVI account and checking the 'My Applications' section.

instruction: Do you offer any courses for kids?
output: Currently, GUVI's primary focus is on professional skill development for adults. We do not have specific courses designed for kids.

instruction: What is the minimum age to enroll in a course?
output: There is no strict age limit, but our courses are designed for individuals looking for professional skill development, typically 16 years and above.

instruction: Can I get a discount if I'm a student?
output: We occasionally run student-specific discounts. Please check our promotions page or contact us with your student ID for any ongoing offers.

instruction: How do I provide feedback on the chatbot?
output: We appreciate your feedback! You can tell me directly, or if you prefer, you can send your suggestions to support@guvi.in.

instruction: What is GUVI's unique selling proposition?
output: GUVI stands out by offering tech education in regional languages, focusing on practical, industry-relevant skills, and providing placement assistance for career growth.

instruction: How do I change my registered name?
output: You can change your registered name in your profile settings. Go to 'Profile' and then 'Edit Profile' to make the necessary changes.

instruction: Can I merge two GUVI accounts?
output: Account merging is a complex process. Please contact our support team with details of both accounts, and they will guide you on the possibility.

instruction: How do I update my payment information?
output: Your payment information is typically managed during the purchase process. If you need to update details for recurring payments (e.g., for installments), please contact support.

instruction: I received a suspicious email claiming to be from GUVI.
output: Please do not click on any links. Forward the email to support@guvi.in so we can investigate, and then delete it. We will never ask for your password via email.

instruction: What is the difference between a course and a specialization?
output: A course is a standalone program on a specific topic. A specialization is a series of related courses designed to give you in-depth expertise in a broader field.

instruction: How do I get a receipt for my course purchase?
output: A receipt is automatically sent to your registered email after a successful purchase. You can also find it in your 'My Purchases' section.

instruction: Can I get a refund if I'm not satisfied with the course?
output: Our refund policy allows for refunds within a specific period (e.g., 7 days) if you haven't consumed a significant portion of the course. Please check our terms and conditions.

instruction: How do I access the live sessions for my Zen Class?
output: Links and schedules for live sessions will be provided in your Zen Class dashboard or via email. Make sure to check your registered email regularly.

instruction: Is there a trial period for courses?
output: While we don't offer a general trial period for all courses, many have free preview lessons or introductory modules you can access.

instruction: Can I share my course access with a friend?
output: No, course access is strictly for the registered user and cannot be shared. Sharing accounts is against our terms of service.

instruction: How do I get technical support for the mobile app?
output: For mobile app issues, please provide details like your device model, OS version, app version, and a description of the problem to support@guvi.in.

instruction: What are the benefits of a GUVI certificate?
output: GUVI certificates are industry-recognized, verifiable online, and can enhance your resume, showcasing your acquired skills to potential employers.

instruction: Do you offer offline classes?
output: Currently, GUVI primarily focuses on online learning. We do not offer regular offline classes.

instruction: How do I report a problem with the payment gateway?
output: If you encounter issues with the payment gateway, please note the error message and contact our support team immediately. They can assist you.

instruction: Can I pause my course progress?
output: For self-paced courses, you can learn at your own pace, so you can pause and resume whenever you like. Bootcamps have fixed schedules, but you can catch up on recordings.

instruction: What is the difference between an 'Expert' and 'Career' track?
output: An 'Expert' track focuses on deep mastery of a specific technology, while a 'Career' track is a comprehensive program designed to prepare you for a specific job role, often with placement support.

instruction: How do I change my registered email?
output: You can change your registered email by logging in, going to 'Profile > Settings > Account Info', and following the steps to update and verify your new email.

instruction: I can't find the course I enrolled in.
output: Please log in and check your 'My Courses' or 'My Learning' section on the dashboard. If it's still missing, contact support with your purchase details.

instruction: What kind of support do you offer after course completion?
output: After course completion, you retain access to course materials and often the community forum. For bootcamps, placement support continues for a defined period.

instruction: How do I reset my account settings?
output: If you wish to reset specific account settings, please specify which ones. For general profile reset, you might need to contact support.

instruction: I want to upgrade my course to a bootcamp.
output: Upgrading from a standalone course to a bootcamp is generally not a direct option. You would typically need to enroll separately in the bootcamp. Contact sales for any special considerations.

instruction: How do I get a personalized course recommendation?
output: Tell me about your current skills, career goals, and what technologies you're interested in, and I can suggest some courses for you.

instruction: Are there any prerequisites for the 'Machine Learning with Python' course?
output: Yes, basic Python programming knowledge and a foundational understanding of mathematics (linear algebra, calculus) are recommended for 'Machine Learning with Python'.

instruction: Can I get a job guarantee with any of your courses?
output: While we offer placement assistance for certain bootcamps, we do not provide a job guarantee. Success depends on individual effort and market conditions.

instruction: How do I access the course content on my tablet?
output: You can access course content on your tablet either through a web browser or by downloading the 'GUVI Learn' mobile app from your tablet's app store.

instruction: What is the duration of the 'Web Development' course?
output: The 'Web Development' course is typically 80-100 hours of content, which can be completed at your own pace over several weeks or months.

instruction: Can I pay for a course using cryptocurrency?
output: No, currently we do not accept cryptocurrency as a payment method. We support traditional payment options like cards, net banking, and UPI.

instruction: How do I apply for a job through GUVI's placement cell?
output: If you are part of a program with placement assistance, your dedicated placement coordinator will guide you through the application process for relevant job openings.

instruction: What are the benefits of enrolling in a Zen Class?
output: Zen Class offers live interactive sessions, dedicated mentorship, hands-on projects, industry-aligned curriculum, and strong placement support, making it a comprehensive learning experience.

instruction: Do you offer courses on blockchain technology?
output: Yes, we have courses on blockchain fundamentals and specific blockchain platforms. Search for 'blockchain' in our course catalog to find them.

instruction: How can I track my refund status?
output: Once a refund is initiated, you will receive a confirmation email. Refunds typically take 5-7 business days to process. You can contact support for status updates.

instruction: I want to learn about DevOps. Which course is best?
output: For DevOps, our 'DevOps Engineering' course or the 'DevOps Zen Class' bootcamp are excellent choices, covering tools like Docker, Kubernetes, and Jenkins.

instruction: Can I get a discount if I refer a friend?
output: We occasionally run referral programs where both you and your friend can get discounts. Check our 'Refer & Earn' section or promotions page for current offers.

instruction: How do I participate in hackathons or coding challenges?
output: GUVI frequently hosts hackathons and coding challenges. Keep an eye on our 'Events' or 'Community' section for announcements and registration details.

instruction: What is the maximum duration to complete a self-paced course?
output: For most self-paced courses, you get lifetime access, meaning there's no maximum duration to complete them once purchased.

instruction: How do I access the course materials after I graduate from a bootcamp?
output: You will typically retain access to the course materials and recordings for a specified period (e.g., 1 year) after completing a bootcamp.

instruction: Can I get a personalized learning path?
output: While we don't offer fully personalized learning paths, I can recommend a sequence of courses based on your goals. What are you aiming for?

instruction: What is GUVI's 'For Students' program?
output: GUVI's 'For Students' program offers special discounts and resources for college students to help them upskill and become industry-ready.

instruction: I forgot my password. How can I reset it?
output: You can reset your password by clicking on "Forgot Password?" on the login page and following the instructions sent to your registered email.

instruction: I didn't receive the password reset email.
output: Please check your spam/junk folder. If it's not there, wait a few minutes or request a new one. Still no luck? Contact our support.

instruction: Can I reset my password using my phone number?
output: Currently, GUVI allows password resets through your registered email only.

output: Password reset links expire after a while. Please request a new one from the "Forgot Password?" page.

output: Password reset links are valid for 30 minutes. After that, you'll need to generate a new one.

output: Sorry about that! Try clearing your browser cache or using incognito mode. If the issue persists, request a new link.

output: Yes, as long as it meets our security criteria. But we recommend using a new password for your account's safety.

output: Please double-check for typos. If you're sure it's correct, try signing up or contact support if you had an old account.

output: For your security, we can't reset it manually. Please use the "Forgot Password?" option on the login page.

output: No worries! Just go to the login page and click "Forgot Password?" to generate a new email.

output: Double-check that you're using the new password. If you're still facing issues, try resetting again or contact support.

output: Please contact support immediately. We'll help secure your account and guide you through the recovery process.

instruction: Can I reset my password through the mobile app?
output: Yes! The 'Forgot Password?' option works the same on both web and mobile versions.

output: For security reasons, we limit multiple reset requests in a short time. Please try again after 15 minutes if blocked.

output: Yes, once reset, your account will be logged out from all other devices automatically.

output: Absolutely! We use encrypted links and secure channels for all password reset operations.

output: That means the link has expired. Please request a new reset email from the login page.

output: Use at least 8 characters including uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and a symbol like ! or # for a strong password.

output: Not at all. Your course data and certificates remain intact even after a password reset.

output: Yes, usually within seconds. If you don't see it, check your spam folder or wait a few minutes.

instruction: I'm looking for a course that can help me build a strong portfolio for web development. Any suggestions?
output: For building a strong web development portfolio, our 'Full Stack Development Bootcamp' is highly recommended as it focuses on hands-on projects and real-world applications.

instruction: I'm a complete beginner in tech. What's the absolute easiest course to start with?
output: If you're a complete beginner, our 'Introduction to Programming with Scratch' or 'Basic Computer Skills' courses are designed to be very accessible and build foundational knowledge.

instruction: I want to learn a skill that's highly in demand right now. What's trending?
output: Currently, skills in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, and Cloud Computing are highly in demand. Our 'AI & ML Master Program' or 'Cloud DevOps Engineer' bootcamp are excellent choices.

instruction: I'm interested in a course that offers a good work-life balance during study. Which one?
output: Our self-paced courses offer maximum flexibility for work-life balance. You can learn at your own pace and schedule. Consider 'Python for Data Science' or 'React.js Fundamentals'.

instruction: I want to learn something that will help me get a promotion in my current IT job. What's suitable?
output: To advance in your IT job, consider courses in advanced cloud technologies, cybersecurity, or specialized data analytics. It depends on your current role; could you tell me more about it?

instruction: Are there any courses that focus on soft skills for tech professionals?
output: Yes, our 'Employability Skills' program and certain bootcamp modules include training on soft skills like communication, teamwork, and problem-solving, crucial for tech professionals.

instruction: I'm looking for a course that's very hands-on and project-oriented. What do you have?
output: Many of our bootcamps, especially 'Full Stack Development' and 'Data Science Bootcamp', are highly project-oriented, allowing you to build a strong portfolio.

instruction: I want to learn something that will help me start my own tech startup. Any entrepreneurial courses?
output: While we don't have specific 'startup' courses, our 'Full Stack Development' or 'Mobile App Development' courses provide the core technical skills needed to build your own product.

instruction: I'm interested in a course that has a strong community aspect. Which one is best for networking?
output: Our Zen Class bootcamps offer strong community interaction through live sessions, dedicated forums, and peer collaboration, which is great for networking.

instruction: Do you have any courses that are specifically designed for experienced developers to upskill?
output: Yes, for experienced developers, we offer advanced courses and specializations in areas like 'Advanced Data Structures & Algorithms', 'Microservices Architecture', or 'DevOps Engineering'.

instruction: I want to learn how to build mobile apps. What are my options?
output: You can learn mobile app development with our 'Android App Development' (Java/Kotlin) or 'React Native Development' courses, depending on your preferred platform or framework.

instruction: Is there a course that combines both front-end and back-end development?
output: Absolutely! Our 'Full Stack Development' course is designed to teach you both front-end (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React) and back-end (Node.js/Python, databases) technologies.

instruction: I'm confused about which programming language to learn first. Can you help?
output: For beginners, Python is highly recommended due to its readability and versatility. Our 'Python for Beginners' course is an excellent starting point.

instruction: I'm looking for a course that's recognized by employers. Which certificates hold value?
output: Our Zen Class bootcamp certificates are highly valued due to their comprehensive curriculum and placement assistance. All our paid course certificates are verifiable and industry-aligned.
